name: Monarch
flavor: The sovereign ruler of a nation, unearthed in the privilege of tradition and wielding unmatched power in their domain.

features.name: Execute Them! - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear per PC in the party to have the group condemned for crimes real or imagined. A PC who succeeds on a Presence Roll can demand trial by combat or another special form of trial.

features.name: Crossguard - Action
features.desc: Once per scene, mark a Stress to summon Tier X Minions, who appear at Close range to enforce the Monarch’s will.

features.name: Census Bell - Reaction Long-Term Countdown (8):
features.desc: Spend a Fear to activate after the Monarch’s desire for war is first revealed. When it triggers, the Monarch has a reason to rally the nation to war and the support to act on that reason. You gain 1d4 Fear.
